name: Bath House
description:
Made for the 2021 Scream Jam !

Movement: With WASD. Find the keys. Get out. Avoit the monsters. (Some walls made out of meat. :DD) Heavily influenced by Silent Hill series. 

Warning!!! This game contains flashing lights and and some moderate but disturbing maybe loud sounds, I did make the volume lower so nobody has a heart attack.

Have fun :)

Still a beginner. As a first game, im proud... Could be better. Modeling, programming by me, sounds are from freesounds.

Cheers,
